**Beltalowda** is a [PICO-8](https://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php) game I'm slowly working on that is based on the classic Asteroids game but with an Expanse-twist. This game is still very much being developed and is far from complete, but I'm still putting it here for friends to play-test etc. The ultimate idea will be to mine asteroids, convert ice into hydrogen for your fuel, then sell other ores for upgrades. Eventually there'll be enemies (inyalowda scum claiming the ore is theirs!) and some gamification as far as scoring goes.

#### Instructions

Control your thrusters using the arrow keys, then use your laser (`Z`) to destroy asteroids and the grapple-hook (`X`) to grapple the ores and collect them.
